DOC.brief_summary: The study design double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-group , dose-finding study one group treat placebo three group treat tafoxiparin three different infusion concentration level , respectively . The intravenous infusion initiate pre-defined bolus dose infusion .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Tafoxiparin Treat Primary Slow Progress Labor Including Prolonged Latent Phase Labor Arrest
DOC.detailed_description: Primary objective To assess dose-response relationship tafoxiparin labor time define time start continuous infusion tafoxiparin/placebo Adjunct Treatment Oxytocin , partus term-pregnant , nulliparous woman require labor augmentation due Primary Slow Progress Labor include prolonged latent phase Labor Arrest . Secondary objective To assess safety efficacy tafoxiparin base safety secondary efficacy parameter evaluate protocol . PK ( pharmacokinetic ) response pregnant woman labor . Methodology All term-pregnant , nulliparous woman present delivery ward potential study patient unless already enrol another clinical study . Subjects may pre-informed study use advertisement information physician/midwife visit pregnancy hospital admission . The whole study include follow step : - Screening Baseline include informed consent randomization - Labor - Discharge - Follow-up 8 ( +/-1 ) week - End study - Safety follow infant 6 month , +/-4 week , telephone interview
DOC.criteria: 1 . Pregnant woman ≥18 ≤45 year age 2 . Nulliparous 3 . Gestational age > 36 week + 6 day confirm ultrasound 4 . Experience slow progress labor include prolonged latent phase labor arrest ( accord respective definition ) etc 1 . Subjects secondary slow progress secondary labor arrest 2 . BMI≥35 first trimester pregnancy 3 . Breech presentation abnormal presentation etc
